Plotting Current Data

Helen Miller

2019-02-01

Source: vignettes/articles/plotting_current_data.Rmd
plotting_current_data.Rmd

PWFSLSmokePlots provides functions to easily generate stylized plots of current data.

library(PWFSLSmokePlots)
# Load current Data
ws_monitor <- loadLatest()
# Set parameters
monitorID <- "060771002_01"
enddate <- lubridate::now()
startdate <- enddate - lubridate::ddays(7)

Timeseries

monitor_ggTimeseries(ws_monitor, 
                     startdate = startdate, 
                     enddate = enddate, 
                     monitorIDs = monitorID)

Daily Barplots

monitor_ggDailyBarplot(ws_monitor, 
                       startdate = startdate,
                       enddate = enddate, 
                       monitorIDs = monitorID)

Diurnal (dailyByHour)

tidy_ggDailyByHour(monitor_toTidy(ws_monitor), 
                   startdate = startdate,
                   enddate = enddate,
                   monitorID = monitorID)

Contents

  • Timeseries
  • Daily Barplots
  • Diurnal (dailyByHour)
